document.run: # Program to check if a number is prime or not num = 407 # To take input from the user #num = int(input("Enter a number: ")) # prime numbers are greater than 1 if num > 1: # check for factors for i in range(2,num): if (num % i) == 0: print(num,"is not a prime number") print(i,"times",num//i,"is",num) break else: print(num,"is a prime number") # if input number is less than # or equal to 1, it is not prime else: print(num,"is not a prime number"))
